      • writeUser

        public static boolean writeUser(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String fname,
                                java.lang.String lname)
                         throws ConnectionManagerException
        Adds a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        username - username value to be written to database
        password - hashed password value to be wrriten to database
        email - email value to be written to database
        fname - first name value to be written to database
        lname - last name value to br written to database
        Returns:
        if sql insert cannot be run return false
        Throws:
        ConnectionManagerException

      • DeleteUsers

        public static void DeleteUsers(java.lang.String[] arrayDeletionSelection)
                        throws ConnectionManagerException
        This method receives an array of UserIDs that have been chosen to be deleted from the database. It loops through the array of IDs and with each loop it executes the delete query. * @param arrayDeletionSelection Holds the UserIDs that have been selected for deletion
        Throws:
        ConnectionManagerException

      • AdminEditUser

        public static java.util.Map AdminEditUser(java.lang.String selectedID,
                                          java.util.Map userDetails)
                                   throws ConnectionManagerException
        This method has a UserID passed into it via selectedID. This value is used to execute an SQL query which retrieves the needed values from that record and returns them via the Map userDetails.To be used by the admin only. * @param selectedID This holds the UserID value of the User that has been selected to be edited.
        Parameters:
        userDetails - This maps the the labels with the relevant details from the database.
        Returns:
        userDetails
        Throws:
        ConnectionManagerException

                            throws ConnectionManagerException

        Throws:
        ConnectionManagerException
